column1: Smoque BBQ////I've been a big fan of Smoque ever since it opened
column2: and despite all of the barbecue restaurants that have followed behind
column3: Smoque still is the tastiest with the best service. All of the main dishes are favorites
column4: and the sides -- especially the mac 'n cheese -- are winners. Get there early
column5: because although it's been around for a few years and all of the other imitators mentioned
